blog-entries.title: Gyokuro
blog-entries.text: Don't worry. As long as you hit that wire with the connecting hook at precisely 88 miles per hour, the instance the lightning strikes the tower, everything will be fine. Of course I do. Just a second, let's see if I could find it. The flux capacitor. That's George McFly. Look, there's a rhythmic ceremonial ritual coming up. He laid out Biff in one punch. I never knew he had it in him. He never stood up to Biff in his life. Can I go now, Mr. Strickland? I, I don't know. Oh. Listen, Doc. Thank god I still got my hair. What on Earth is that thing I'm wearing? George, buddy. remember that girl I introduced you to, Lorraine. What are you writing? That's Strickland. Jesus, didn't that guy ever have hair? Doc, she's beautiful. She's crazy about me. Look at this, look what she wrote me, Doc. That says it all. Doc, you're my only hope. You okay, is everything alright?
blog-entries.author: André-Pascal Werthwein

blog-entries.title: Sencha
blog-entries.text: Hey, Doc? Doc. Hello, anybody home? Einstein, come here, boy. What's going on? Wha- aw, god. Aw, Jesus. Whoa, rock and roll. Yo You're gonna break his arm. Biff, leave him alone. Let him go. Let him go. And Jack Benny is secretary of the Treasury. I hope you don't mind but George asked if he could take me home. He's your brother, Mom.
blog-entries.author: André-Pascal Werthwein
